text: Meet Me After the Show is a 1951 American musical movie directed by Richard Sale and starring Betty Grable, Macdonald Carey, Rory Calhoun, Eddie Albert, Fred Clark. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1951 musical movies Category:American musical movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Sale
title: Meet Me After the Show
